The Race was a stretch of water located off the southern edge of the Tethyr Peninsula in west Faer√ªn. The sea was named for the strong winds through it
In the 14 century DR, the Race and Asavirs Channel were used to reach the wealthy ports of the south, but such shipping was harassed by pirates based in the nearby Nelanther Isles.  Once through the Race, merchant ships came under the protection of the Calimshan navy.
In the , the Companions of the Hall traveled through the Race after escaping the pirate Pinochets fleet and landed in Memnon.
